name: CongaRobot
0:
”Alexa, tony start cleaning”
”Alexa, tony stop cleaning”
”Alexa, tony start charging”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conga robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the CongaRobot skill for Alexa, you can control sweeping robot with your voice.
Here's a step by step guide:
1. Download Conga5290 app from Google Play or App Store.
2. Turn on your smart devices and connect them with "Conga5290" app. Rename your device, such as my robot.
3. Type in or search "CongaRobot" in Alexa app. Click ENABLE TO USE and login to link your Conga5000 account..
4. Say: "Alexa, discover devices". Keep waiting utill you hear "Discover is completed".
5. Now, you can control your smart devices with your voice.
You can say:
Alexa, turn on [your device nickname].
Alexa, turn off [your device nickname].
Alexa, [your device nickname] start cleaning
Alexa, [your device nickname] stop cleaning
Alexa, [your device nickname] start charging
Alexa, [your device nickname] stop charging
Alexa, [your device nickname] locate robot

to clean specify room, you need to divide different rooms in map first, then give command to Alexa to clean one specific room.
Alexa, [your device nickname] clean bedroom
Alexa, [your device nickname] clean living room
Alexa, [your device nickname] clean hall
Alexa, [your device nickname] clean kitchen
Alexa, [your device nickname] clean balcony
